content: Energy and Water Development funding for FY2010 was provided in H.R. 3183, which became P.L. 111-85 when signed by President Obama on October 28, 2009, totaling $33.5 billion. After rejection of both versions, H.R. 1473 was passed, funding Energy and Water Development programs at approximately $32.2 billion for FY2011.
